sub_fields.label: Paginate
sub_fields.name: paginate
sub_fields.message: If more than maximum posts, posts will be paginated.

sub_fields.label: Use Global Posts Per Page
sub_fields.name: use_global_posts_per_page
sub_fields.message: If enabled, the "Blog pages show at most" setting under Settings > Reading will be used.

sub_fields.label: Post Types
sub_fields.name: post_type
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty, standard blog posts will be shown.

sub_fields.label: Categories
sub_fields.name: categories
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty, all categories will be shown.

sub_fields.label: Tags
sub_fields.name: tags
sub_fields.instructions: If left empty, all tags will be shown.

sub_fields.label: Use AJAX
sub_fields.name: use_ajax
sub_fields.message: Blog posts will be fetched without a complete page reload.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank to hide. NOTE: If this field does not load properly, it may be necessary to first Save/Update your page before the WYSIWYG editor will load properly.

sub_fields.label: Contact Form 7 Shortcode
sub_fields.name: contact_form_7_shortcode
sub_fields.instructions: If left blank, the entire section will be hidden.

sub_fields.label: Enable Infinite Load More
sub_fields.name: enable_infinite_load_more
sub_fields.message: When then last image in a group is in view, another group of images will fetched from the server and will appear in view.

sub_fields.label: Enable Lightbox
sub_fields.name: enable_lightbox
sub_fields.message: If enabled, images are clickable and expand to fill the whole screen and operate as a gallery or "carousel".

sub_fields.label: Enable Masonry Layout
sub_fields.name: enable_masonry_layout
sub_fields.message: If enabled, images will retain aspect ratio and all available space will be used.

sub_fields.label: Flow Direction
sub_fields.name: flow_direction
sub_fields.default_value: Horizontal flows left-to-right, vertical flows top-to-bottom.

sub_fields.label: Tint Image
sub_fields.name: tint_image
sub_fields.instructions: Applies a semi-opaque overlay over the slide image. When checked, opacity can be adjusted using the range slider below.

sub_fields.label: Show Navigation
sub_fields.name: show_navigation
sub_fields.message: Show previous and next navigation buttons on top of slides.

sub_fields.label: Show Pagination
sub_fields.name: show_pagination
sub_fields.message: Show dots representing the number of slides at the bottom of the slider.

sub_fields.label: Autoplay Delay
sub_fields.name: autoplay_delay
sub_fields.instructions: Delay between slide changes in milliseconds. This field accepts multiples of 500ms. (1000 equals 1 second)

sub_fields.label: Stop on Interaction
sub_fields.name: stop_on_interaction
sub_fields.message: If enabled, when the user interacts by dragging slides or clicking either navigation button autoplay will be stop indefinitely.

sub_fields.label: Use Global FAQ Items
sub_fields.name: use_global_faq_items
sub_fields.message: If enabled, FAQ items entered under FAQ in the main WordPress admin menu will be used.

sub_fields.label: Only Allow 1 Item Expanded
sub_fields.name: only_allow_1_item_expanded
sub_fields.instructions: If checked, this option will only allow one FAQ item to be expanded at a time.

sub_fields.label: Landscape Image
sub_fields.name: landscape_image
sub_fields.instructions: Image should be landscape orientation dimensions with a minimum width of 1920 pixels.

sub_fields.label: Portrait Image
sub_fields.name: portrait_image
sub_fields.instructions: If left blank, the landscape image will be used as a fallback. Portrait image should be portrait orientation dimensions with a minimum width of 1000 pixels.

sub_fields.label: Tint Image
sub_fields.name: tint_image
sub_fields.message: Apply a tinted overlay over the image.

sub_fields.label: Body Text
sub_fields.name: body_text
sub_fields.instructions: Leave blank to hide. NOTE: If this field does not load properly, it may be necessary to first Save/Update your page before the WYSIWYG editor will load properly.
